useCase.name: Add New Edge Agent
useCase.description: Alice adds a new edge agent with selected authorizations.

preconditions.precondition: Alice has chosen existing or add a new device option in Edge Agent Start.
Edge Agent 2 has been provisioned as described in Provision New Agent diagram.

mainSequence.step: Edge Agent 2 provides instructions for adding Agent 2 and selecting authorizations.
Alice adds agent with selected authorizations.
Edge Agent 1 displays provisioning code for adding Agent 2.
Alice shows the code to Edge Agent 2.
Edge Agent 2 sends add request and necessary keys.
Edge Agent 1 stores keys in wallet.
Agent 1 adds keys and authorizations for Agent 2 to policy registry.
Edge Agent 1 syncs data to Agent 2.
Edge Agent 2 stores data in wallet.
